languages.text: {n}Доброжелательное лицо Ахиллеаса мигом лишается всяких эмоций. Некоторое время он молча смотрит на вас, а затем кивает, словно самому себе:{/n} "Я благодарю вас за откровенность. Надеюсь, Лорд-инквизитор сумеет разобраться в произошедшем".

{n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."
languages.original_text: {n}Доброжелательное лицо Ахиллеаса мигом лишается всяких эмоций. Некоторое время он молча смотрит на вас, а затем кивает, словно самому себе:{/n} "Я благодарю вас за откровенность. Надеюсь, Лорд-инквизитор сумеет разобраться в произошедшем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candor. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

{n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candor. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

{n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

{n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

{n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯原本和善的脸上，瞬间失去了所有情感。他看了你一会儿，之后点了点头，似乎是在自言自语。{/n}“感谢您的坦率，我希望大审判官大人可以彻查此事。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯原本和善的脸上，瞬间失去了所有情感。他看了你一会儿，之后点了点头，似乎是在自言自语。{/n}“感谢您的坦率，我希望审判长大人可以彻查此事。”

languages.text: {n}La amistosa expresión de Achilleas pronto pierde toda emoción. Te mira durante unos momentos y asiente para sí.{/n} «Le agradezco el candor. Espero que el Lord Inquisidor investigue completamente el asunto».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}La amistosa expresión de Achilleas pronto pierde toda emoción. Te mira durante unos momentos y asiente para sí.{/n} «Le agradezco el candor. Espero que el Lord Inquisidor investigue completamente el asunto».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスの朗らかな表情から、たちまちすべての感情が消え失せる。アキレアスは少しの間こちらを見つめてからうなずくと、言い聞かせるように口を開く。{/n}「正直にお話しくださり感謝します。ロード・インクィジターが徹底的な調査を行うといいのですが」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスの朗らかな表情から、たちまちすべての感情が消え失せる。アキレアスは少しの間こちらを見つめてからうなずくと、言い聞かせるように口を開く。{/n}「正直にお話しくださり感謝します。ロード・インクィジターが徹底的な調査を行うといいのですが」

languages.text: {n}Aus Achilleas' freundlicher Miene verschwindet schlagartig jede Emotion. Er blickt dich kurz an und nickt dann, wie zu sich selbst.{/n} "Ich danke Euch für Eure Offenheit. Ich hoffe, der Großinquisitor wird die Angelegenheit gründlich untersuchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Achilleas' freundlicher Miene verschwindet schlagartig jede Emotion. Er blickt dich kurz an und nickt dann, wie zu sich selbst.{/n} "Ich danke Euch für Eure Offenheit. Ich hoffe, der Großinquisitor wird die Angelegenheit gründlich untersuchen."

languages.text: {n}Alors qu'il gardait jusque-là une expression cordiale, le visage d'Achilleas se vide soudain de toute émotion. L'homme vous observe attentivement pendant un long moment avant de hocher la tête.{/n} « Merci de votre franchise. J'espère que le seigneur inquisiteur mènera une enquête approfondie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors qu'il gardait jusque-là une expression cordiale, le visage d'Achilleas se vide soudain de toute émotion. L'homme vous observe attentivement pendant un long moment avant de hocher la tête.{/n} « Merci de votre franchise. J'espère que le seigneur inquisiteur mènera une enquête approfondie. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas'ın şen ifadesi anında değişip yüzündeki bütün duygular çekiliyor. Kısa bir süre sana bakakalıyor, ardından başını eğitip kendi kendine konuşurcasına devam ediyor.{/n} "İçtenliğiniz için teşekkür ediyorum. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun konuyu detaylıca inceleyeceğini umuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's genial expression is instantly drained of all emotion. He looks at you for a few moments, then nods, as if to himself.{/n} "I thank you for your candour. I hope that the Lord Inquisitor investigates the matter thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas'ın şen ifadesi anında değişiyor ve yüzündeki bütün duygular çekiliyor. Kısa bir süre sana bakakalıyor, ardından başını eğiyor ve kendi kendine konuşur gibi devam ediyor:{/n} "İçtenliğiniz için teşekkür ediyorum. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun konuyu detaylıca inceleyeceğini umuyorum."
